Title: The Short List
Director: Robert Bates, John C. Ching, Gerard Elmore, Jason K. Lau, Todd J. Robertson, Stefan C. Schaefer
Writer: Robert Bates (segment), Jess T. Johnston (segment), Jason K. Lau (segment), Stefan C. Schaefer (segment), Grant Ching (segment), Jason K. Lau (segment), Dallas Moffis (segment), Cedric Yamanaka (segment), Jason K. Lau (segment), Dallas Moffis (segment)
Actors: Emily Rae Abang, Anuhea, Daryl Bonilla, Jon Bopp
Plot: THE SHORT LIST is a series of short films that are 100% produced from homegrown talent from Hawaii. The episodes include: HOTEL STREET, THE PROTECTOR, ROUND UP, ONE EVENING IN THE BLUE LIGHT BAR and GRILL, and BAIT.
